DOC.brief_summary: This study examine extent low dose broccoli-derived beverage enhance detoxication air pollutant excrete urine compare maximal dose show effective previously .
DOC.detailed_description: This 2-week placebo control Phase II broccoli sprout intervention conduct Qidong , P.R . China . Up twelve hundred people farm township screen one hundred seventy eligible individual enrol study . Participants randomize 4 treatment group : one receive juice beverage contain standard dose glucoraphanin- sulforaphane-rich broccoli sprout powder mixed pineapple juice , lime juice water , second receive one-half dose , third one-fifth dose fourth group receive placebo beverage contain pineapple juice , lime juice water . Participants drink assign beverage every evening provide consecutive 12-hour urine collection throughout duration study .
DOC.criteria: good general health history chronic illness normal liver function test normal renal function test personal history cancer except nonmelanoma skin cancer use prescribe medicine woman , positive pregnancy test
